sentences.en: a sporting celebrity
sentences.cn: 体育明星

sentences.en: Although now a celebrity in her own right, actress Lynn Redgrave knows the difficulties of living in the shadow of her famous older sister.
sentences.cn: 虽然女演员琳恩·雷德格雷夫现在依靠自己的能力出了名，但她明白生活在大名鼎鼎的姐姐的阴影里有多不容易。

sentences.en: At 62, Brian found the celebrity and status that had eluded him for so long.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩在62岁时获得了多年来未能得到的名望和地位。

sentences.en: celebrity chef/gardener etc
sentences.cn: 名厨/名人园艺师等

sentences.en: Does he find his new celebrity intruding on his private life?
sentences.cn: 他是否感觉到他最近的成名侵扰了他的私生活？

sentences.en: Every sort of compensation, even that of celebrity, is refused to him.
sentences.cn: 一切赔偿, 甚至名誉的赔偿, 他都不能得到.

sentences.en: He achieved celebrity as a sports commentator.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名体育评论员而享誉四方。

sentences.en: He even talked about getting out of the celebrity business.
sentences.cn: 他甚至还提过要放弃追星的工作.

sentences.en: He has become a celebrity.
sentences.cn: 他已经是大名鼎鼎的人物了.

sentences.en: He’s a national celebrity.
sentences.cn: 他是全国有名的人物。

sentences.en: In 1944, at the age of 30, Hersey suddenly became a celebrity.
sentences.cn: 1944年，30岁的赫西一夜成名。

sentences.en: In those circumstances Nixon reversed his attitude toward my growing celebrity.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,尼克松对我的声名鹊起完全一反常态.

sentences.en: It seemed difficult for the celebrity couple to get rid of the ubiquitous paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 这对名人夫妻想要摆脱无所不在的狗仔队似乎很困难。

sentences.en: Joanna has finally made it to the first rank of celebrity after 25 years as an actress.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜当了25年演员后，终于跻身一线女明星之列。

sentences.en: Later, most executives reduce their need for celebrity and replace it with a desire for reputation.
sentences.cn: 在这以后, 大部分经理减少了对出名的要求,代之以对声望的向往.

sentences.en: On red - letter nights a large gathering greeted the celebrity.
sentences.cn: 喜庆之夜,蜂拥的人群热烈欢迎这位名人.

sentences.en: Recently published photographs have fueled speculation the celebrity couple is breaking up.
sentences.cn: 最近刊登的照片引起大众臆测这对名人夫妻分手了.

sentences.en: Their marriage was as one the few celebrity unions that would last.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻被视作少有的、可以持久下去的名人联姻之一.

sentences.en: Tom found himself something of a celebrity.
sentences.cn: 汤姆意识到自己已小有名气了.

sentences.en: We invited a number of minor celebrities (= people who are not very famous ) .
sentences.cn: 我们邀请了一些小有名气的人物。
